### EP922-231733 CFIA Roof Replacement, Lethbridge, Alberta
#### Solicitation Summary
The [Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) ](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) invites proposals for the roof replacement at the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) site in Lethbridge, Alberta.

#### Tender Details
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3888979026
* **Publication Date:** March 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 2, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT (Penalty for late submissions)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 31, 2023
* **Contracting Entity:** PSPC
* **End User Entity:** CFIA
* **Location:** Lethbridge, Alberta

#### Tender Description
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires a roof replacement at their facility in Lethbridge, Alberta. Bidders must submit their proposals, including all required supporting documentation, by May 2, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT. Late submissions will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

#### Selection Criteria
The lowest price will be the selection criterion for this tender.

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to all vendors who meet the eligibility criteria and are in compliance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
* Hector Ho (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [hector.ho@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:hector.ho@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Online Tender
The tender package can be accessed at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15791210?extsite=MTU3OTEyMTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.
